inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getSecretVersion.

secretId.description: Specifies the secret containing the version that you want to retrieve. You can specify either the ARN or the friendly name of the secret.

versionId.description: Specifies the unique identifier of the version of the secret that you want to retrieve. Overrides `version_stage`.

versionStage.description: Specifies the secret version that you want to retrieve by the staging label attached to the version. Defaults to `AWSCURRENT`.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getSecretVersion.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

secretBinary.description: Decrypted part of the protected secret information that was originally provided as a binary.

secretString.description: Decrypted part of the protected secret information that was originally provided as a string.

versionId.description: Unique identifier of this version of the secret.
